cards.rule: I will win exactly 2 tricks and they will be in a row
I will win none of the first 3 tricks
This is an example rule for 2/2/2
This is an second example rule for 2/2/2
This is an third example rule for 2/2/2
I will win a trick that contains only odd-numbered cards
I will win only the first trick
I will win as many pink as blue cards in one trick
This is a fourth example rule for 1/1/1
This is a fifth example rule for 1/1/1
This is a sixth example rule for 1/1/1
